text: Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand?, (Ja'ne, pajomʙariro), hol on ki mo maişati rūzguzaronii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonaşon taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat (ja'ne, daromadanaşon ʙa çannat) az on cī onho çam' meovarand az moli dunjo, ʙehtar ast
